welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colne, where the charm of a quaint English town meets the energy of a bustling city. Explore our rich history, local markets, and beautiful parks – we invite you to make the most of your stay in our charming town."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights at Linton-On-Ouse Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
